channel.title: How do I change the color of the client?
channel.description:
Curently a server I play is using blurrr's client, without any options, such as 'file' 'options' etc, I would like to know how to add that first off, but more importantly, i'm using the red version, how can I add different colors?
Re posted in this section, thanks to Prima. -Hyram

item.title: How do I change the color of the client?
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“Gorilla Lova, post:5, topic:328544”]Sounds like a challenging job, thanks once again

Does this all go in the gui?[/quote]

yes, unless it ties into something different, such as something to do with chat text, npcs, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I change the color of the client?
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Gorilla Lova:

Thanks a million, do you know how to add ‘file, options’ ? etc

Sure.

Firstly, you’ll need to create an instance of the JMenu and JMenuBar class:

JMenuBar menuBar = new JMenuBar(); JMenu fileMenu = new JMenu("File");

Replace “File” with whatever you want the menu to be called.

Next you will need to create an array to store the menu item names:

String[] fileMenuItems = new String[] { "Menu option 1", "Menu option 2" };

You can create another option be adding:

, "Menu option 3"

After:

"Menu option 2"

Next we need to add these menu items to the menu:

for (String name : fileMenuItems) { JMenuItem menuItem = new JMenuItem(name); menuItem.addActionListener(this); fileMenu.add(menuItem); }

Finally we add the menu to the menuBar, and the menuBar to the frame:

menuBar.add(updateMenu); frame.getContentPane().add(musicMenuBar, BorderLayout.SOUTH);

Read full topic

item.title: How do I change the color of the client?
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

In your Gui.java you will see something like:

UIManager.setLookAndFeel("org.jvnet.substance.skin.SubstanceMagmaLookAndFeel");

You’ll need to change the “SubstanceMagmaLookAndFeel” to a different theme name. All of the theme names are below.

SubstanceAbstractSkin SubstanceAutumnLookAndFeel SubstanceBusinessBlackSteelLookAndFeel SubstanceBusinessBlueSteelLookAndFeel SubstanceBusinessLookAndFeel SubstanceChallengerDeepLookAndFeel SubstanceCremeCoffeeLookAndFeel SubstanceCremeLookAndFeel SubstanceEmeraldDuskLookAndFeel SubstanceFieldOfWheatLookAndFeel SubstanceFindingNemoLookAndFeel SubstanceGreenMagicLookAndFeel SubstanceMagmaLookAndFeel SubstanceMangoLookAndFeel SubstanceMistAquaLookAndFeel SubstanceMistSilverLookAndFeel SubstanceModerateLookAndFeel SubstanceNebulaBrickWallLookAndFeel SubstanceNebulaLookAndFeel SubstanceOfficeBlue2007LookAndFeel SubstanceOfficeSilver2007LookAndFeel SubstanceRavenGraphiteGlassLookAndFeel SubstanceRavenGraphiteLookAndFeel SubstanceRavenLookAndFeel SubstanceSaharaLookAndFeel

Read full topic
